alert.note: Alert for Piatt (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 9:46AM CST until February 20 at 2:00PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Sangamon River at Monticello affecting Piatt County. .The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sangamon River at Monticello. * WHEN...Until early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flooding of agricultural areas begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Friday the stage was 12.5 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage this evening to 13.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday morning to 12.1 feet and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Sangamon River Monticello 13.0 12.5 Fri 9 am CST 13.5 12.8 12.1 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to prepare for flooding. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation.
